metadata.synopsis: A refugee camp dialog for the tiefling kid Umi.

0.speaker: Umi
0.text: They got me signed up to learn to make pots, which is dumb. I'd rather learn how to kill cultists. And I bet you'd back me up on that.

1.speaker: Umi
1.text: They got me signed up to learn to make pots, which is dumb. I'd rather learn how to kill cultists. And I bet you'd back me up on that.
